Name: courses-total-scores
Description: Total scores earned by a student in each course

Name: courses-max-scores
Description: Max score of each course the student is enrolled in

Name: courses-time-spent
Description: Total time spent by a student in each course

Name: courses-last-elements
Description: Last three learning elements completed by a student

Name: topics-total-scores
Description: Total scores earned by a student in each topic

Name: topics-max-scores
Description: Max score of each topic within the selected course

Name: topics-time-spent
Description: Total time spent by a student in each topic

Name: topics-last-elements
Description: Last three learning elements completed by a student within the selected course

Name: elements-completion-status
Description: Completion status of the best attempt by a student on each learning element in topic

Name: elements-max-scores
Description: Max score of each learning element within the selected topic

Name: elements-time-spent
Description: Total time spent by a student on each learning element

Name: elements-last-elements
Description: Last three learning elements completed by a student within the selected topic
